channel.title: New Articles in the Encyclopedia of Laser Physics and Technology
channel.description: The latest 20 articles of the Encyclopedia of Laser Physics and Technology.
channel.copyright: Dr. RÃ¼diger Paschotta, RP Photonics Consulting GmbH, 2019

item.title: Optical coherence tomography
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "optical coherence tomography":

item.title: Intensity modulators
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "intensity modulators": devices which can be used to modulate the intensity (power) of a light beam

item.title: Multipass gas cells
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "multipass gas cells": a cell which allows to realize multiple passes of a laser beam through a gas

item.title: Optical phase
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "optical phase": the phase of the electric field of an optical wave, usually considered in the time domain

item.title: Pump chambers
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "pump chambers": a part of a lamp-pumped solid-state laser, containing a laser rod, one or more lamps, reflectors, a cooling arrangement and possibly other parts

item.title: Multi-core fibers
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "multi-core fibers": optical fibers containing more than one fiber core

item.title: Radiation pressure
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "radiation pressure": a mechanical pressure resulting from incident light or other radiation

item.title: Brewsters angle
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "Brewsters angle": an angle of incidence at which there is no reflection of p-polarized light at an uncoated optical surface

item.title: Optical frequency
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "optical frequency": the oscillation frequency of the electric field of light

item.title: Few-mode fibers
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "few-mode fibers": fibers supporting only few guided modes

item.title: Modal bandwidth
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "modal bandwidth": the maximum optical bandwidth (limited by intermodal dispersion) which can be used in a telecom fiber

item.title: Graded-index fibers
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "graded-index fibers": optical fibers with a continuously varying refractive index in the radial dimension

item.title: Differential mode delay
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "differential mode delay": the range of time delay values for signals in a telecom fiber

item.title: Wavelength
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "wavelength": the spatial period of a plane wave

item.title: Orientation-patterned semiconductors
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "orientation-patterned semiconductors": semiconductors containing a periodic pattern of domain orientation

item.title: Effective nonlinear coefficient
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "effective nonlinear coefficient": a coefficient for quantifying the strength of a nonlinear interaction

item.title: Multiphoton absorption
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "multiphoton absorption": absorption processes where multiple photons are absorbed simultaneously

item.title: Multiphonon absorption
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "multiphonon absorption": absorption processes involving multiple phonons

item.title: Molecular lasers
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "molecular lasers": gas lasers where the laser-active gas consists of molecules rather than separate atoms or ions

item.title: Synchronization of lasers
item.description: Encyclopedia article on "synchronization of lasers": the synchronization of light pulses generated with lasers
